=== Core Pdf writer

- Simple PDF export is included in OxyPlot core library
- Limitations (text encoding, fonts, images)

```cs
using (var stream = File.Create(fileName))
{
    var pdfExporter = new PdfExporter();
    pdfExporter.Export(plotModel, stream, 600, 400);
}
```

See also the section about the [PortableDocument] class that can be used to create general PDF files.

=== OxyPlot.Pdf

- based on [http://www.pdfsharp.net|PdfSharp] / [https://silverpdf.codeplex.com|SilverPdf] open-source projects
- better handling of fonts and images
